item.title: Lori add a quote by Melissa Bank
item.description: "We are all children until our fathers die." -- Melissa Bank

item.title: Lori add a quote by Melissa Bank
item.description: "It scares me. But then I get this big feeling, simple but exalted: He's like me, just with different details." -- Melissa Bank

item.title: Lori add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you're looking for sympathy you'll find it between shit and syphilis in the dictionary." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Lori add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "Everyone looks retarded once you set your mind to it." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Lori add a quote by Augusten Burroughs
item.description: "I myself am made entirely of flaws, stitched together with good intentions." -- Augusten Burroughs

item.title: Lori add a quote by Augusten Burroughs
item.description: "Like cubic zirconia, I only look real. I'm an imposter. The fact is, I am not like other people." -- Augusten Burroughs

item.title: Lori add a quote by Jeffrey Eugenides
item.description: "She understood that her heart operated on its own instructions, that she had no control over it or, indeed, anything else." -- Jeffrey Eugenides

item.title: Lori add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Lori add a quote by Tim O'Brien
item.description: "Fiction is the lie that helps us understand the truth." -- Tim O'Brien

item.title: Lori add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "Nobody deserves your tears, but whoever deserves them will not make you cry." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: Lori add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "The world must be all fucked up," he said then, "when men travel first class and literature goes as freight." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: Lori add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "We were not a hugging people. In terms of emotional comfort it was our belief that no amount of physical contact could match the healing powers of a well made cocktail." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Lori add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you aren't cute, you may as well be clever." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Lori add a quote by Melissa Bank
item.description:
"You did the best you could," and she seemed to believe I had.
I said, "I've just been going through the motions," using the expression my father had after he'd watched my first tennis lesson.
"Sweetie," she said, "that's what a lot of life is." -- Melissa Bank

item.title: Lori add a quote by Melissa Bank
item.description: "He said, "People wait their whole lives for the kind of happiness we have." -- Melissa Bank

item.title: Lori add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Lori add a quote by Edward Gorey
item.description: "There are so many things we've been brought up to believe that it takes you an awfully long time to realize that they aren't you." -- Edward Gorey

item.title: Lori add a quote by Edward Gorey
item.description: "My mission in life is to make everybody as uneasy as possible. I think we should all be as uneasy as possible, because that's what the world is like." -- Edward Gorey

item.title: Lori add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "I became insane, with long intervals of horrible sanity." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Lori add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description:
"On Undecided Voter​s: "To put them in perspective, I think​ of being​ on an airplane.​ The flight attendant comes​ down the aisle​ with her food cart and, eventually,​ parks​ it beside my seat.​ “Can I inter​est you in the chick​en?​” she asks.​ “Or would​ you prefer the platter of shit with bits of broke​n glass​ in it?”
To be undecided in this elect​ion is to pause​ for a moment and then ask how the chick​en is cooked." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Lori add a quote by Laurie Notaro
item.description: "Asininity was puddling all around me in quantities too vast to soak up. - It Looked Different on the Model" -- Laurie Notaro

item.title: Lori add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "When I despair, I remember that all through history the way of truth and love have always won. There have been tyrants and murderers, and for a time, they can seem invincible, but in the end, they always fall. Think of it--always." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lori add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "So, this is my life. And I want you to know that I am both happy and sad and I'm still trying to figure out how that could be." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Lori add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Because,' she said, 'when you're scared but you still do it anyway, that's brave." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Lori add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "But I have always thought that these tulips must have had names. They were red, and orange and red, and red and orange and yellow, like the ember in a nursery fire of a winter's evening. I remember them." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Lori add a quote by Victor Frankl
item.description: "An abnormal reaction to an abnormal situation is normal behavior." -- Victor Frankl

item.title: Lori add a quote by Viktor E. Frankl
item.description: "When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves." -- Viktor E. Frankl

item.title: Lori add a quote by Viktor E. Frankl
item.description: "But there was no need to be ashamed of tears, for tears bore witness that a man had the greatest of courage, the courage to suffer." -- Viktor E. Frankl

item.title: Lori add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "It's so much darker when a light goes out than it would have been if it had never shone." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Lori add a quote by John Green
item.description: "My thoughts are stars I cannot fathom into constellations." -- John Green
